languages.text: Не в силах сделать выбор между созданным ей Орденом и человеком, без которого она не прошла бы свой путь, Арджента сложила полномочия и отправилась в добровольное изгнание. Несмотря на это любовь жителей Простора к ней только возросла. На долгие столетия Арджента стала героиней песен и сказок, светлым ангелом, являющимся в самый темный час чтобы защитить страждущих от сил тьмы.

Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.
languages.original_text: Не в силах сделать выбор между созданным ей Орденом и человеком, без которого она не прошла бы свой путь, Арджента сложила полномочия и отправилась в добровольное изгнание. Несмотря на это любовь жителей Простора к ней только возросла. На долгие столетия Арджента стала героиней песен и сказок, светлым ангелом, являющимся в самый темный час чтобы защитить страждущих от сил тьмы.

traits.locale_text: Not able to choose between the Order she created and a person without whom she wouldn't be able to complete her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into a voluntary exile. Despite this, the love of the people of the Expanse only grew. For many centuries, Argenta became a heroine of songs and stories, a radiant angel, coming at the darkest hour to protect the suffering from the forces of darkness.

Not able to choose between the Order she created and a person without whom she wouldn't be able to complete her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into a voluntary exile. Despite this, the love of the people of the Expanse only grew. For many centuries, Argenta became a heroine of songs and stories, a radiant angel, coming at the darkest hour to protect the suffering from the forces of darkness.

Not able to choose between the order she had created and the person she couldn't complete her journey without, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel, coming at the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

Not able to choose between the order she had created and the person she couldn't complete her journey without, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel, coming at the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

languages.text: 然而，若是没有行商浪人，阿洁塔恐怕注定无法完成这场朝圣之旅。在她一手创建的修会与她的前任指挥官之间，她无法做出取舍。最终，她辞去了职位，开始了流亡之旅。尽管如此，科罗努斯扩区的人们对她的爱戴仍与日俱增。在接下来的数个世纪里，阿洁塔成为了无数英雄歌谣与传说故事的女主角。在这些故事中，她是一位光芒四射的天使，会在最黑暗的时刻出现，保护无辜者免受黑暗力量的伤害。
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: 然而，若是没有行商浪人，阿洁塔恐怕注定无法完成这场朝圣之旅。在她一手创建的修会与她的前任指挥官之间，她无法做出取舍。最终，她辞去了职位，开始了流亡之旅。尽管如此，科罗努斯扩区的人们对她的爱戴仍与日俱增。在接下来的数个世纪里，阿洁塔成为了无数英雄歌谣与传说故事的女主角。在这些故事中，她是一位光芒四射的天使，会在最黑暗的时刻出现，保护无辜者免受黑暗力量的伤害。

languages.text: Sie konnte nicht wählen zwischen der von ihr geschaffenen Ordnung und der Person, ohne die sie ihre Reise nicht abschließen konnte. Sie legte ihr Amt daher nieder und ging ins Exil. Trotz allem wuchs unter den Bewohnern der Ausdehnung die Liebe für sie nur noch. Argenta sollte noch jahrhundertelang die Heldin von Liedern und Sagen bleiben, ein strahlender Engel, der in der dunkelsten Stunde kam, um die Unschuldigen vor den Mächten der Finsternis zu beschützen.
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Sie konnte nicht wählen zwischen der von ihr geschaffenen Ordnung und der Person, ohne die sie ihre Reise nicht abschließen konnte. Sie legte ihr Amt daher nieder und ging ins Exil. Trotz allem wuchs unter den Bewohnern der Ausdehnung die Liebe für sie nur noch. Argenta sollte noch jahrhundertelang die Heldin von Liedern und Sagen bleiben, ein strahlender Engel, der in der dunkelsten Stunde kam, um die Unschuldigen vor den Mächten der Finsternis zu beschützen.

languages.text: Incapable de se résoudre à choisir entre l'ordre qu'elle avait créé et la personne sans qui elle ne pouvait continuer son voyage, elle renonça à ses responsabilités et s'exila. Malgré tout cela, l'amour que lui portaient les habitants des Étendues ne fit que grandir. Argenta devint durant des siècles l'héroïne de chansons et de légendes qui la décrivaient comme un ange radieux apparaissant lors des heures les plus sombres pour protéger les innocents des forces obscures.
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Incapable de se résoudre à choisir entre l'ordre qu'elle avait créé et la personne sans qui elle ne pouvait continuer son voyage, elle renonça à ses responsabilités et s'exila. Malgré tout cela, l'amour que lui portaient les habitants des Étendues ne fit que grandir. Argenta devint durant des siècles l'héroïne de chansons et de légendes qui la décrivaient comme un ange radieux apparaissant lors des heures les plus sombres pour protéger les innocents des forces obscures.

languages.text: Incapaz de elegir entre el orden que había creado y la persona sin la que no podía completar su viaje, abandonó su puesto y se marchó al exilio. A pesar de todo, el amor que la gente de la Extensión sentía hacia ella no dejó de aumentar. Argenta sería la heroína de canciones y leyendas durante siglos; un ángel radiante que aparecería en los momentos más oscuros para proteger a los inocentes de las fuerzas de las tinieblas.
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Incapaz de elegir entre el orden que había creado y la persona sin la que no podía completar su viaje, abandonó su puesto y se marchó al exilio. A pesar de todo, el amor que la gente de la Extensión sentía hacia ella no dejó de aumentar. Argenta sería la heroína de canciones y leyendas durante siglos; un ángel radiante que llegaba en los momentos más oscuros para proteger a los inocentes de las fuerzas de las tinieblas.

languages.text: 自分が作り上げた秩序と、自分なしでは旅を完遂できない人物、そのどちらかひとつを選ぶことができず、彼女はその地位を退いて亡命した。それでも、エクスパンスの人々の彼女への愛は高まるばかりだった。アルジェンタは何世紀にもわたって歌や物語のヒロインとなり、最も苦しい時に彼らを訪れては、闇の力から罪のない人々を守る、輝きの天使となった。
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: 自分が作り上げた秩序と、自分なしでは旅を完遂できない人物、そのどちらかひとつを選ぶことができず、彼女はその地位を退いて亡命した。それでも、エクスパンスの人々の彼女への愛は高まるばかりだった。アルジェンタは何世紀にもわたって歌や物語のヒロインとなり、最も苦しい時に彼らを訪れては、闇の力から罪のない人々を守る、輝きの天使となった。

languages.text: Yarattığı düzen ve yolculuğunu tamamlamasında ona büyük destek olan kişi arasında seçim yapamadı ve mevkisini bırakarak sürgüne gitti. Her şeye rağmen Enginlik halklarının ona duyduğu sevgi, gittikçe güçlendi. En zor anlarında masumların karşısına çıkan ve onları karanlığın güçlerine karşı koruyan görkemli melek Argenta, yüzyıllar boyunca dillerden düşmeyecek şarkıların ve hikâyelerin kahramanı olacaktı.
languages.original_text: Unable to choose between the order she had created and the person without whom she could not have completed her journey, she stepped down from her position and went into exile. Despite everything, love for her among the people of the Expanse only grew. Argenta would be the heroine of songs and tales for centuries to come, a radiant angel who would appear in the darkest hour to protect innocents from the forces of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Yarattığı düzen ve yolculuğunu tamamlamasında ona muazzam destek olmuş kişi arasında bir seçim yapamadı ve mevkisini bırakarak sürgüne gitti. Her şeye rağmen Enginlik halkları arasında ona duyulan sevgi gittikçe güçlendi. En çok ihtiyaç duydukları anda masumların karşısına çıkan ve onları karanlığın güçlerine karşı koruyan görkemli melek Argenta, yüzyıllarca dillerden düşmeyecek şarkıların ve hikâyelerin kahramanı olacaktı.
